name: World T20: Cricket Super Sixes Challenge Game
name_original: World T20: Cricket Super Sixes Challenge Game
description:
Play a quick game of cricket with super fun and excitement.
In this T20 Cricket season, we are launching this real fast cricket game for you.
We have developed EPIC Cricket with one and only one objective in mind, i.e. to fulfill the desires of the millions of followers of the game to have the most complete and immersive experience of playing Cricket on a mobile platform like never before.
The team behind the game has deployed complex algorithms and techniques to build an amazingly realistic experience that will leave a lasting impression on gamer’s visual and auditory senses.



GAME FEATURES:
HD quality visuals with life-like international players
Full match live commentary
Full repertoire of modern batting and bowling styles
Players with matching capabilities to international stars
All major Cricket playing nations
Fun fast cricket turbo shots
Realistic batsman animation
2 different game modes: Day and Day-Night
Impressive graphics and playability
Physics engine used
Realistic shot and ball flight
Highscore for each game mode
Original cricket ground sounds
A Free hit game but you get out when you are bowled

You will entertain with the game playability.
